Pegawai KPK Mau Dijadikan PNS, Tjahjo Kumolo: Kita Atur dengan Baik
04 Nov 2019, 07:21 by Usman Hadi


enteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo/Foto: Usman Hadi/detikcom

Yogyakarta - Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo mengatakan kini pihaknya sedang menerima masukan dari berbagai pihak berkaitan dengan rencana pegawai KPK dijadikan ASN atau PNS. Terkait rencana itu, Tjahjo berjanji akan mengatur pengangkatan ASN di KPK dengan baik. "Sekarang kami (sedang) menerima masukan-masukan, dari pejabat KPK kami juga menerima masukan. Nanti kita atur dengan baik," jelas Tjahjo di Kepatihan Kantor Gubernur Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta (DIY), Senin (4/11/2019).Tjahjo menuturkan, pengangkatan pegawai KPK menjadi ASN merupakan amanat Undang-undang (UU) No 19 tahun 2019. UU itu merupakan hasil revisi yang dilakukan DPR RI atas UU No 30 Tahun 2002 tentang KPK. "Undang-undang (mengamanatkan) begitu (pegawai KPK merupakan ASN)," tutur politikus Partai Demokrasi Indonesia (PDI) Perjuangan itu.Tjahjo menjamin pegawai KPK akan mendapatkan berbagai kemudahan setelah menjadi PNS, di antaranya pegawai tersebut bisa bertugas di kementerian atau lembaga lain karena berstatus ASN."Kan enak kalau dia jadi PNS (sekaligus) jadi pegawai KPK. Dia bisa tugas di Kementerian-lembaga yang lain, tidak hanya di satu lembaga itu saja. Dia bisa muter di mana-mana, bisa menjadi pegawai Kemenpan-RB," pungkas dia. KPK Employees Want to Be Used as Civil Servants, Tjahjo Kumolo: We Arrange Well
Nov 04 2019, 07:21 by Usman Hadi


enteri Utilization of State Apparatus and Bureaucratic Reform (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo / Photo: Usman Hadi / detikcom

Yogyakarta - Minister of Administrative Reform and Bureaucracy Reform (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo said that now his party was receiving input from various parties relating to the plan of KPK employees to be ASN or PNS. Related to the plan, Tjahjo promised to arrange ASN appointment in the KPK well. "Now we (are) receiving input, from KPK officials we also receive input. Later we will arrange it well," said Tjahjo at the Kepatihan Office of the Governor of the Special Region of Yogyakarta (DIY), Monday (4/11/2019). Tjahjo said The appointment of KPK employees to ASN is mandated by Law No. 19 of 2019. The law is the result of a revision by the Indonesian Parliament for Law No. 30 of 2002 concerning the KPK. "The law (mandates) is so (KPK employees are ASN)," said the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDI) politician. Tjahjo guarantees that KPK employees will get various facilities after becoming a civil servant, among whom the employee can serve in other ministries or institutions because he has the status of ASN. "It would be nice if he became a civil servant (at the same time) as an employee of the KPK. He could work in other Ministries, not just in that one institution. He could turn around everywhere, could become an employee of Kemenpan-RB , "he concluded.
